channel.title: CVE Feed for SMS OVH -- SMS OVH
channel.description: The latest CVEs for SMS OVH -- SMS OVH

item.title: CVE-2021-38357|2024-09-17T00:05:40.529Z -- sms%20ovh -- sms%20ovh
item.description: The SMS OVH WordPress plugin is vulnerable to Reflected Cross-Site Scripting via the position parameter found in the ~/sms-ovh-sent.php file which allows attackers to inject arbitrary web scripts, in versions up to and including 0.1.
